main event: A report of an unidentified flying object sighted over Catalina, California on September 22, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as a round saucer shape and the size of a pea,The color of the object was purplish white at first sighting and faded to whitest color,The object appeared to be stationary at first and then moved northwest toward Los Angeles where it disappeared from view, The sighting lasted for about ten minutes, The witness was considered fairly reliable due to their association with jet aircraft activity.
witness description: the witness was associated with jet aircraft activity
